flawed_nl_solution:
He has already done 264 this week because 34 + 20 + 123 + 64 + 23 = <<34+20+123+64+23=264>>264.
If he does 60 he will have done as many as last week because 324 - 264 = <<60=60>>60
He has to do 63 on Saturday because 60 + 1 = <<60+1=63>>63

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 61, not 63. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
